long_description: With jeans styling and a durable nylon canvas fabric, the Marmot Hatteras pants keep you looking sharp mile after mile on your weekend backpacking trips. Abrasion-resistant nylon fabric dries quickly and provides UPF 50+ protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Soft DriClime(R) polyester lining at the waistband is comfortable next to skin. The Marmot Hatteras pants have a standard five-pocket design, plus a cell phone pocket on the right side.
short_description: With jeans styling and a durable nylon canvas fabric, the Marmot Hatteras pants keep you looking sharp mile after mile on your weekend backpacking trips.
